name: TopUp Plus
author: Puzich

sections.description:
TopUp is a jQuery based wordpress plugin which implements TopUp.

TopUp does the same as all the other “box”-scripts, light lightview, thickbox, floatbox, fancybox or lightview. Further, it plays videos in the overlay. It has
the same functionality as the wordpress plugin lightview plus. Because both have the same code base, the first version of TopUp Plus is 2.5, as the actual version of lightview plus.

This plugin automatically enhance image links to use topup. No need to edit things manual.

Read installation instructions on my website

Lies die Installationsanweisungen auf meiner Webseite

Lies die FAQs auf meiner Webseite
sections.changelog:
2.5.3.2

  • [FIX] fixed vimeo autoplay option
  • [FIX] added TopUp SWF Files for youtube and other flash players

2.5.3.1

  • [FIX] small YouTubeHQ bug fix

2.5.3

  • [FIX] small YouTube Feed fix
  • [NEW] new vimeo embed code to work with iphone, ipad… (haven’t tested it, because I don’t own an iPad)
  • [NEW] use of wp_remote_fopen to use curl or fopen

2.5.2

  • [FIX] “node no longer exists” error. Websites with this error have to wait 24 hours, until the error disapiers. Sorry for this!
  • [ATTENTION] Default values are not written. Will be fixed in next version. This release is for WP3.0 to get it work!

2.5.1

  • [FIX] popup fixed. changed function.
  • [FIX] deactivation of plugin works now

2.5

  • [NEW] First release
